Class BatteryStorageTile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.tiles.tiles_objects.Tile
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.tiles.tiles_objects.BatteryStorageTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BatteryStorageTile extends Tile
This type of tile will represent the battery storages

  • Constructor Details

    • BatteryStorageTile

      public BatteryStorageTile(String image, ConnectorType topType, ConnectorType rightType, ConnectorType bottomType, ConnectorType leftType, int batteryCapacity) throws IllegalArgumentException
      The builder generates the array for representing the connectors of the tile and sets the maximum capacity of the storage
      Parameters:
      image - The image of the tile.
      topType - Indicates the type of the connector positioned on the top side of the card
      rightType - Indicates the type of the connector positioned on the right side of the card
      bottomType - Indicates the type of the connector positioned on the bottom side of the card
      leftType - Indicates the type of the connector positioned on the left side of the card
      batteryCapacity - Indicates the maximum number of batteries the storage can hold
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • useBatteryNumber

      public int useBatteryNumber(int batteryNumber)
      Use a number of battery from the tile.
      Parameters:
      batteryNumber - number of batteries that needs to be used.
      Returns:
      the number that was actually removed.
